channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiPresence
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiPresence

item.title: CVE-2023-27998|2024-08-02T12:23:30.828Z -- fortinet -- fortipresence
item.description: A lack of custom error pages vulnerability [CWE-756] in FortiPresence versions 1.2.0 through 1.2.1 and all versions of 1.1 and 1.0 may allow an unauthenticated attacker with the ability to navigate to the login GUI to gain sensitive information via navigating to specific HTTP(s) paths.
